disease: Basal cell carcinoma of skin of left lower limb, including hip

symptoms.name: Small, sometimes shiny bump or scaly flat patch
Change in skin appearance
symptoms.pattern: New growth, change in previous growth, recurring sore

symptoms.name: Ulceration
symptoms.pattern: May occur in advanced stages, causing bleeding and infection

physical_findings: Skin-colored or pink bump (on white skin)
Brown or glossy black bump with rolled border (on brown and Black skin)
Growth or sore that won't heal
risk_factors: Long-term exposure to ultraviolet (UV) radiation from sunlight or tanning beds

required: Physical examination findings consistent with BCC
